alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:31PM CDT until June 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL PIKE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS...NORTHEASTERN RALLS AND NORTH CENTRAL PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New London, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Pike County in west central Illinois, northeastern Ralls and north central Pike Counties in northeastern Missouri, including the following locations... Ilasco, Saverton, and Ashburn. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
